maqras.text: Job implored his Lord Adversity befallen me de all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Ni respond him relieved his adversity restored his famili por him ecx twice as mult. Ke est mercy us reminder worshipers
Ankaux Ismail Idris Zal-Kifl; all est steadfast pacient
Ni admitted them our mercy ili est righteous
Zan-Noon (Jonah 1 kun â€˜N' en his nom) abandoned his misi en protest opini ni ne control him! Li ended imploring darkness grand fisx belly Tie ne est di Vi. Vi glor. Mi committed gross pek
Ni respond him sav him el kriz; ni tiel sav believers
Zachariah implored his Lord My Lord do ne keep me heir Vi est bon inheritor
Ni respond him granted him John; ni fiks his wife him! Ili uz hasten work righteousness implored us situaci de joy ankaux as tim! Al us ili est reverent
As por 1 who argument her virginity ni blov her our spirit tiel ni far her her fil portent des whole mond
Your congregation est 1 congregation mi sol est your Lord vi worship Me sol
Ili divid disput religi. All da them ven us judgment
As por those work righteousness while kred their work ne ir waste ni recording gxi
Gxi forbidden any community ni annihilated return
Ne Gog Magog reappear testament ili tiam return - Ili ven cxiu direction
Est when inevitable prophecy ven pas disbelievers stare en horror Ve al us ni est oblivious! Ja ni est wicked
Vi idols vi worship besides DI testament est fuel Infer; this est your inevitable destiny
those est di ili ne ended Infer. All its inhabitants abide gxi forever
Ili sigh gxem therein ili ne hav access any news
As por those ind our magnificent rekompenc ili protekt el gxi
Ili ne auxd its sibl Ili gxu abode kie ili get cxio ili dezir forever
great horror ne worry them angxel ricev them joyfully This est your tag promes vi
Ke tag ni fald heaven fald libr. Just as ni iniciat 1 creation ni ripet gxi. This est our promes; ni certainly port gxi
Ni dekret Psalm tro as ali scriptures ti ter hered My righteous worshipers
This est proclamation popol est worshipers
Ni send vi mercy us des whole mond
Proklam mi don divine inspiration your di est 1 di! Vi tiam submit
Ili turn tiam dir mi avert vi suficx mi ne hav ide kiel baldaux late (retribution) ven vi
Li est fully aware da your publik utterances Li est fully aware da cxio vi conceal
all mi kon this mond est test vi temporary enjoyment
Dir My Lord Your judgment est absolut justice Our Lord est plej Gracious; nur His help streb en des vizagx de your pretend
